author: gcolvin
content:
> I *hope* this doesn't lead to a big debate, but I suspect it is going to... <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2982#pullrequestreview-489698517>
<@!301186049323958275> 
Yeah, right.  I just asked for it to become changed to "Informational" at the least -- it does not propose any actionable change to the existing protocol.  Since it appears that nothing more is needed on the Ethereum blockchain than a contract then an ERC for that contract might be more appropriate.
